titleStmt.title: The little barly-corne. Whose properties and vertues here, shall plainly to the world appeare: to make you merry all the yeere. To the tune of Stingo.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Come, and doe not musing stand ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part; second part has title: Second part of the little barly-corne ...
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
